name: High Tide (clairitee)
description:
Ava is stranded at the lighthouse after a huge storm causes dangerously high tides. When she tries to communicate with the nearby town, she notices some strange occurrences.

[Click on objects to interact]

[Click on the floor above or below you to move around the lighthouse]

This game is my final project for my Narrative Design class! It's the opening scene of what would be a much larger game. Any feedback is super appreciated!
